# uptimekuma_notification_aliyunsms (Data Source)

Get Aliyun SMS notification information by ID or name

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "uptimekuma_notification_aliyunsms" "example_by_name" {
  name = "Aliyun SMS Notification"
}

data "uptimekuma_notification_aliyunsms" "example_by_id" {
  id = 1
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
- `name` (String) Notification name
